modName: Bigger Backpack Mod (60/96 Slot With/Without Food & Water Bar on HUD)
modShortDescription: Bigger Backpack mod for 7 Days to Die. 60 and 96 slot versions, both with or without food and water bar on the HUD depending on what you prefer.
modDescription:
Bigger Backpack mod for 7 Days to Die. 60 and 96 slot versions, both with or without food and water bar on the [HUD](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/) depending on what you prefer. Both have different unlocked/locked [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) so pack mule will still work to unlock everything.

**60 slot:** 40 unlocked/20 locked.  
**96 slot:** 61 unlocked/25 locked.

Make a Mods folder in your 7 Days to Die directory and unzip the file into there (should be KHA60-BBM/KHA96-BBM or some variation thereof for the folder name.)

**Alpha 19 Versions**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-60BBM)** 60 slot backpack mod for **A19**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-60BBMFW)** 60 slot backpack mod with food and water bar on HUD for **A19**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-96BBM)** 96 slot backpack mod for **A19**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-96BBMFW)** 96 slot backpack mod with food and water bar on HUD for **A19**  
**Alpha 18 Versions**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khainemodlets/-/archive/master/khainemodlets-master.zip?path=KHA18-60BBM)** 60 slot backpack mod for **A18**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khainemodlets/-/archive/master/khainemodlets-master.zip?path=KHA18-60BBMFW)** 60 slot backpack mod with food and water bar on HUD for **A18**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khainemodlets/-/archive/master/khainemodlets-master.zip?path=KHA18-96BBM)** 96 slot backpack mod for **A18**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khainemodlets/-/archive/master/khainemodlets-master.zip?path=KHA18-96BBMFW)** 96 slot backpack mod with food and water bar on HUD for **A18**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19558-khaines-a19-modlets-bigger-backpacks-backpack-buttons-hp-bars-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
